system
Interface Coord

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoordImpl
public interface Coord

This interface represents coordinates on the map.

Author:
Simon Busard

toString

java.lang.String toString()
Return a string representation of the coordinates. Format is the followed : (x,y) where x and y are corresponding coordinates in meters

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Precondition:
-
Postcondition
return a string representation of coordinates

fromString

void fromString(java.lang.String loc)
                throws java.lang.Exception
Sets the coordinate from astring representation

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
Precondition:
loc has for prefix (x,y) where x,y are the coordinates as integers in meters.
Postcondition
the coord fits the data in loc if the format and localisation are valid, else it is unchanged.

dist

returns the straight line distance between this coordinate and b.

Parameters:
b -
Returns:
a positive integer equal to the dist from b.
